page.title: 15CUSTOMS AND EVENTS
page.content: PICNIC DAY This has been running for 87 years. There is a new Rose Queen every year. There is a fancy dress parade and fun sports for children also a BMX course. There is a picnic tea in the Hall and in the evening a Disco. VILLAGE CHRISTMAS PARTY It is funded by village committees. There are children's games in the village hall. There are presents from Father Christmas for every child in the village. There is tea for children and adults. Entertainment at night is provided by Skelton School. The church usually organises an annual Garden Party often in the grounds of Musgrave Hall and there is a system of village supper dances, domino and whist drives.
